 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצָה‎</span>] **verb** ==cut off== (Late Hebrew ***id., separate***, Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קצה‎</span> ***cut off, exterminate***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְצָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break off*** (e.g. bread); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be remote***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***remote extremity***); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצוֺת עַמִּים‎</span> [[Hab.2.10|Hab 2:10]] ***cutting off*** many ***peoples***; [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַצּוֺת‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קצץ‎</span>); [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲצִיקוֺתָ‎</span>. **Pi\`el** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקַצּוֺת בְּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.10.32|2Kgs 10:32]] ***to cut off in Israel***; read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְצוֺף‎</span> ***to be angry with***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Crit. n. [[Isa.14.6|Isa 14:6]] (in Commentaries)</sup> [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]], [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]]; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָקוּץ‎</span>; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַצֶּח רַגְלַיִם‎</span> [[Prov.26.6|Prov 26:6]] (figurative). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְצוּ‎</span> [[Lev.14.41|Lev 14:41]], accusative ***dust; Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְצוֺת‎</span> v[[Lev.14.43|Lev 14:43]], accusative ***house***, in both apparently = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַע‎</span> ***scrape, scrape off*** (q. v., v[[Lev.14.41|Lev 14:41]] a), and so probably read, namely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְצְעוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקְצִיעַ‎</span>, [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPhil. xvi (1888), 72</sup> [[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]-[[BDB#Ry|Ry]] [[BDB#Baen|Baen]].
